items.question_en: This mountain range looms over Jenny Lake and a line of homesteads known as Mormon Row. The T. A. Moulton Barn, reputedly “the most photographed barn in America,” sits below the (+) three tallest peaks in this mountain range, known as the Cathedral Group. The John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Parkway runs alongside this range, which rises to the north of the ski resort town of (*) Jackson Hole. Its highest peak is nicknamed “The Grand.” For the points, give this Wyoming mountain range that names a national park south of Yellowstone.
items.question_zh: 这条山脉俯瞰珍妮湖与名为“摩门排屋”的宅地带。被称为“美国拍照最多的谷仓”的 T. A. Moulton 谷仓位于该山脉下方，附近三座最高峰合称“教堂群峰”。小约翰·D·洛克菲勒公园大道沿这条山脉延伸；山脉位于滑雪胜地杰克逊霍尔以北。其最高峰昵称为“The Grand”。问：这是怀俄明州哪条山脉（其名也是黄石以南国家公园名称）？

items.question_en: In this country, child laborers still work on the world’s largest rubber plantation, which was built in 1926 after this country’s government gave Firestone Rubber complete control over its finances. After Panama, this country maintains the world’s second-largest (+) maritime registry, with over 3000 ships flying its flag, primarily as a “flag of convenience.” This country lies in a region once known as the Grain Coast, or (*) Pepper Coast. In the 1990s, its dictator Charles Taylor traded guns for blood diamonds from its northwestern neighbor, Sierra Leone. For the points, name this poor West African country originally founded by freed American slaves with capital Monrovia.
items.question_zh: 在这个国家，童工仍在世界最大橡胶种植园劳动。该种植园建于1926年，当时该国政府将财政完全交由凡士通橡胶公司掌控。继巴拿马之后，该国拥有世界第二大船舶登记册，3000多艘船挂其国旗，多作为“方便旗”。该国位于曾被称作“谷物海岸”或“胡椒海岸”的地区。1990年代，其独裁者查尔斯·泰勒曾以武器换取来自西北邻国塞拉利昂的“血钻”。问：这个由获释美国黑奴建立、首都蒙罗维亚的西非贫困国家是哪个？

items.question_en: This region’s flag consisted of small red, white, blue, and black stripes in the top left of a large yellow patch, a symbol of the doctrine “Five races under one union.” An attempt to attract Jews to settle in this region was put forth in the (+) Fugu Plan. As this region was being invaded in Operation August Storm by the Soviet Union, its capital was moved to (*) Tonghua from Hsinking. Puyi was the nominal head of, for the points, what Japanese puppet government set up after the Mukden Incident in Manchuria?
items.question_zh: 这一地区的旗帜是大片黄色底，左上有红白蓝黑细条纹，象征“五族协和”。“河豚计划”曾试图吸引犹太人迁居该地。苏联“八月风暴行动”入侵该地时，其首都曾从新京迁往通化。溥仪是该地名义上的统治者。问：这是在“九一八事变”后由日本在满洲建立的哪个傀儡政权？

items.question_en: This site is home to the village of Sivu’ovi, a prominent settlement of the Basketmaker II era, and other settlements in this site include the Agate House and the Puerco ruins. This site’s “Newspaper Rock” has been inscribed with over 650 (+) petroglyphs by this park’s former inhabitants, the Pueblo. This park’s northern sector extends into the (*) Painted Desert, and its most famous features are the result of burial by volcanic sediment since the Triassic period. For the points, name this national park in Arizona known for its fossilized trees.
items.question_zh: 该遗址内有 Sivu’ovi 村（篮编者 II 时期重要聚落），其他聚落包括 Agate House 与 Puerco 遗址。这里的“报纸岩”刻有650多幅岩画，出自其早期居民普韦布洛人。公园北部延伸至彩绘沙漠；其最著名景观源于三叠纪以来被火山沉积掩埋形成。问：这是亚利桑那州哪座以树木化石闻名的国家公园？
options_en: Petrified Forest National Park Page 2 US Varsity and JV National - International Geography Bee 2016-2017 Bee Finals Phase 2

items.question_en: In what is now this country, the fortress of La Goletta overlooked a major port that Spain repeatedly lost and recaptured over the course of a century. This present-day country was the central territory of the Hafsid Dynasty. (+) Spain sent multiple 16th-century expeditions to seize this country’s large, sandy island of Djerba, whose final loss in 1560 occurred during the leadup to the Great Siege of (*) Malta. Fifty years after the conquest of Algeria, this former Ottoman territory became a French protectorate. For the points, name this country where Barbary corsairs were once based in Tunis.
items.question_zh: 在如今这个国家境内，拉戈莱塔要塞俯瞰一处重要港口，西班牙在一个世纪中多次得而复失。现今该国曾是哈夫斯王朝核心领地。16世纪西班牙多次远征试图夺取该国大沙岛杰尔巴，最终于1560年在马耳他大围攻前后失利。征服阿尔及利亚50年后，这片前奥斯曼领地成为法国保护国。问：这个曾有巴巴里海盗以突尼斯为基地的国家是哪个？
